title: Lol Patcher doesn`t start
body:
I reinstalled my windows7 and then installed league of legends. When i run the game the icon pops up for a second and then goes away.
And i got this in task manager:https://imgur.com/a/9cfhD

replies.body: This is likely caused by a permissions problem that's preventing the patcher from launching.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help fix this!
